entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 23 January 2023
